SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_order_product_relationship (op_id, goods_id, create_date, create_name, update_date, update_name, company_id) values (#{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update t_order_product_relationship set op_id = #{opId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_name = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_name = #{updateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where relationship_id = #{relationshipId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select relationship_id, op_id, goods_id, create_date, create_name, update_date, update_name, company_id from t_order_product_relationship where relationship_id = #{relationshipId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select relationship_id, op_id, goods_id, create_date, create_name, update_date, update_name, company_id from t_order_product_relationship
